009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramMatcher;
017import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
018import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
019
020/**
021 * Adapts image intensities to match a Gaussian histogram.
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 * 
025 * @see HistogramMatcher
026 * @see HistogramPlot
027 *
028 */
029public class Match_To_Gaussian_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        private static double GaussMean = 128;
032        private static double GaussVariance = 128;
033        
034        @Override
035        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
036                return DOES_8G;
037        }
038        
039        @Override
040        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
041                
042                // get histograms
043                int[] hi = ip.getHistogram();
044                int[] hG = makeGaussianHistogram(GaussMean, GaussVariance);
045                                
046                (new HistogramPlot(hi, "Image Histogram")).show();
047                (new HistogramPlot(hG, "Gaussian Histogram")).show();
048                
049                double[] nhG = HistogramUtils.normalizeMax(hG);
050                (new HistogramPlot(nhG, "Gaussian Hist. normalized")).show();
051                
052                double[] chG = HistogramUtils.cdf(hG);
053        (new HistogramPlot(chG, "Gaussian Hist. cumulative")).show();
054                
055                HistogramMatcher m = new HistogramMatcher();
056                int[] F = m.matchHistograms(hi, hG);
057                
058//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
059//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
060//              }
061                
062                ip.applyTable(F);
063                int[] hAm = ip.getHistogram();
064                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
065                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
066        }
067        
068        private int[] makeGaussianHistogram (double mean, double sigma) {
069                int[] h = new int[256];
070                double sigma2 = 2 * sqr(sigma);
071                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
072                        double x = mean - i;
073                        double g = Math.exp(-sqr(x) / sigma2) / sigma;
074                        h[i] = (int) Math.round(10000 * g);
075                }
076                return h;
077        }
078
079}
080
